content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that requires iron-plate
- Assembling machine (position z2) that requires iron-gear-wheel
- Assembling machine (position z3) that requires electronic-circuit

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors when attempting to craft items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you are using the correct machines for crafting or smelting items, as some recipes require specific machines.
